data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 from Mauritania (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bílý, Svatopluk (2016): A new species of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 from Mauritania (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini). Zootaxa 4072 (3): 384-386, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.3.7
